title: Problem 2114_E
statement: Once, Kirei stealthily infiltrated the trap-filled estate of the Ainzbern family but was discovered by Kiritugu's familiar. Assessing his strength, Kirei decided to retreat. The estate is represented as a tree with n vertices, with the root at vertex 1. Each vertex of the tree has a number a_i recorded, which represents the danger of vertex i.
